website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Devotion XT Mid received a good mix of positive and negative reviews. It was well-liked for the comfort it delivered and the ankle support it offered. Testers were impressed with how well it worked for dance workouts. Purchasers also lauded the style and color options. On the downside, the rubber wings holding the straps broke quickly. The width confused some persons because it was either narrow or wide. But overall, buyers who were able to acquire the right fit were delighted with their purchase.
pros: The comfort and shock absorption offered by the Ryka Devotion XT Mid exceeded the expectations of the majority of owners
A lot of fitness aficionados commended the performance of the trainers during various dance and cardio workouts because the Pivot Point allowed them to turn with ease
Numerous reviewers marked this footgear as being true to size and width
The high collar with the strap closure provided adequate ankle support, said many workout enthusiasts
The style and colorways of these workout shoes were appreciated by plenty of shoppers
Multiple users enjoyed how light the shoe felt on their feet
Several people liked that the inside did not get too warm while they were exercising
cons: A significant number of consumers complained that the rubber wings holding the straps broke after only a few weeks of use
The width of the Ryka Devotion XT Mid confused a minority of critics
some got ones with a narrow toe box while others stated their pair was too wide
Several folks were not fans of the strap closure system
Compared to other Ryka models, the cushioning on this model was not comfortable, stated a few buyers
Despite the mid-cut style, some wearers ranted that the ankle support was insufficient
A handful of individuals wanted more color options to choose from

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba, extremely soft support.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. The softest walk I can ever imagine. From the moment I put these on it was like walking on pillows made for my feet. There is a cushion at the back of the show that adds more comfort. Great shoes. I use them for Zumba and they are wonderful. I didn't give 5 stars only for the reason I would have personally liked them to be a bit higher as I have an old ankle injury that the podiatrist wants high tops for better support. They do support my feet and ankles but with softness.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for Zumba!
customer_reviews.text: Im a Zumba instructor and I LOVE these shoes! I have 2 small bone spurs & there is the perfect amount of cushion for protection of those painful area. There is room for an orthodic also. They support your ankl but there's still room to move. The sole has a supportive circle for spinning (alot of turning & twisting in Zumba) this circle on the sole takes pressure off the ball of your foot. You can glide with control. The sole is a bit to smooth for other types of exercise like boot camp.But for any kind of dance they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tomatogirl

customer_reviews.title: These are THE BEST sneakers ever for dance fitness & jazzercise
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST sneakers ever for dance fitness & jazzercise! I have horrible plantar fasciitis and when I do jazzercise or dance fitness formats I can barely move without pain. These shoes are so supportive and cushioning that for the first time in years I am not having foot pain when I exercise! I will definitely order more - they're great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba!
customer_reviews.text: As a dance fitness instructor, not only was I looking for comfort, but also really good arch support, and these did not disappoint. Great for high impact, I could dance in them all day! I only gave them 4 stars, because I didn’t like the Velcro strap in the front, (I removed them)... Made me think of toddler, or senior citizen shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dancingwithjesus

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second pair in another color....these are great for dance/zumba type classes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support for a picky Zumba dancer
customer_reviews.text: I do Zumba and cardio dance classes 4 times a week and I am no longer super young, so I need a lot of cushion and support when I dance. I also have super delicate feet. I put these shoes on for the first time for a 2hr Zumbathon and they did not hurt me once. Amazing feel, cushion, ankle support, super cute and vibrant color. I only wish Ryka made them in other colors. The other black and white option is kind of boring.
customer_reviews.author: apimomof2

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes a little pricey for the lack of leather
customer_reviews.text: These trainers feel great. In fact, they feel better than my other cross trainer Rykas for some reason. My first pair years ago were in black with teal threading & a tad bit of patent leather. I wore them out to the point I was adding super glue to continue wearing them. Then I sprung for some denim looking ones with a noticeable difference in the comfort, still a good workout and lunge shoe. Feeling hooked I ordered the mostly black with a splash of of other colors. These by far are not the prettiest shoe but is the most comfortable. Great workout shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am a dance fitness instructor. Recently during a training was told that basketball shoes are good for dance fitness. So I listened and boy did I waste my money! They were too “sticky” and even though they had the turn spot on the bottom it hurt me! So I decided to splurge on these and honestly wore them for the first time today. I was very impressed with the comfort and flexibility they had even for the first time! My only complaint is that I may have been able to go a half size smaller but that will be my next pair. I will update in a few months, after I have time to break them in more
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Last pair of RYKAs I’ll buy.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn RYKAs for many years, but this will be my last pair. The shoe is comfortable, but it just feels cheap. Plus, the company’s customer service is abysmal. They fixed the design flaw, changing the small triangular piece you lace through from a soft rubber to a hard plastic so it no longer tears after a few wears (not that they’ll admit there was a problem in the first place), but the shoe now runs a half size smaller, so size up. If the pair you get has the softvtriangular piece, send them back. They won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: lhwohl

customer_reviews.title: Get on the Good Foot
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the real deal! Love it! I wear this shoe every day. It helped my back, my feet and my ankle injurie. This shoe helped my get through weekouts pain free. And great when I'm cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but has a form over function defect
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. This is a great show in many ways destroyed by a form over function issue. Good support and movement with that pivot zone. Wide enough to use a custom orthotic and reasonable price. The side decorative straps are attach by a flimsy plastic triangle that broke. I had to cut the hanging strap off both sides on one shoe. Bummer Ryka!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka. Started buying them for their roomier toe box, which no other sneaker seems to have. Got the Turquoise/Pink and I love the colors. Not your standard sneaker. I like that these are 3/4 height, not full height. The back has a cushion, which prevents rubbing. I love this sneaker. Sorry for those that did not have a good experience, but I definitely recommend Ryka shoes.
customer_reviews.author: HausFrau

customer_reviews.title: Broke and useless in under 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good shoe but in less than 2 months of sporadic use the rubber piece holding the lace to the strap that runs across the back broke. Its pretty flimsy and in looking at it I'm surprised it held up as long as it did, which, of course put it beyond the 30 day return window. I can't recommend a shoe with this type of fatal flaw, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Rhody

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite shoes of all time! I have to order wide width or my plantar fasciitis in my left heel flares up. But these shoes never hurt my feet in any way. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Oh.my.gosh!! I love these, so amazing and fits as expected. True to size all the way. I wear a size 10 in womens so I ordered these in my normal size and they fit great. I am definitely buying me some more of these in a different color. These have a cushy sole inside and it feels great while walking. Like walking on air with these. Amazing! I recommend these to anyone interested in this type of style of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda O.

customer_reviews.title: Walking in clouds
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have ankle issues & need support. Not only do these give me support but I feel like I’m walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Stretched out/ trash after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT INJURY. Stretched out so much that my feet slip and I sprung my ankle and twisted my knee. My Dr says it was due to the shoes. Even with two pairs of socks I can slip off without untying. Tried to return but they only accept unworn shoes.
customer_reviews.author: California408

customer_reviews.title: I love Ryka 3/4 high-tops
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for years and every year they just get better. I mostly wear them for working out. For me they are comfortable and support my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe for ankle support and after reading the reviews it seemed to be a good choice. These shoes are falling apart in as little as 2 months. I wanted a supportive shoe as we moved last month and knew how long and busy the days would be and wanted a comfortable shoe. Total waste of $. Do yourself a favor and pass on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: William T

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the shoes for 3 months and there is already a hole in it. The fabric is different from before!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive but a little tight and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are really good-looking shoes, but they seem a little tighter than usual in the toe-box. The support does not seem as good as some Ryka styles for high-impact aerobic exercises at the gym. They are nice for zumba and lower impact activities. They slide easily for twists and turns as in dance moves. Overall, I like them, but I prefer other Ryka styles, like the Tenacity, for most of my gym classes. They also feel heavier than most Ryka styles.
customer_reviews.author: ppsc

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because i was looking for a high top sneaker to exercise and walk in because i have a torn tendon in my ankle and needed lots of support. So far they are working out very well. I believe they are true to size. Easy to put on and off. Can tighten around the ankle with the velcro. I would buy these again and recommend them. There was no beeaking in have been comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M

customer_reviews.title: the fit especially the toebox
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical about this shoes at first "cause ordered the regular Ryka sneakers before and it was too narrow. Looking for a high top dance shoe and this keeps coming up during the search. Decided to order 7.5W. And this really came as a surprise, fit nicely, used it several times working out( boot camp, circuit training and zumba). The shoes worked very well, enough space at the toebox. Heels were comfortable. And the shoes pivot nicely when doing zumba. Hopefully these shoes will last long, planning to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: rubber rubs against sides
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for more ankle support but the sides rub against the top section of the outer and inner leg right above the ankle during side stretches/lounges. Overall it does maintain a fairly good balance but was expecting more balance for this type of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: frandma

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I usually order direct from Ryka - they didn't have any of this style in my size. I contacted them to ask if they were discontinuing this model - they could not come back with a definitive answer. I'll continue to order from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Zumba Baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started Zumba again but this time I am really overweight due to a car accident. So im trying to jump around with a ton of extra weight. My back was killing me and me feet and ankles but..... not anymore I love these shoes for Zumba. Wouldnt really use them for any other work out. I have my Asics for that though.
customer_reviews.author: Sdays

customer_reviews.title: Too small, weirdly shaped around heel
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, heel is too high, felt like I was trying to walk on my toes and the edge of the heel was on the edge of my heel, so smashed my toes into the front of the shoe when I walked which makes them very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: robert marshall

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for Zumba & MixxedFit. Unfortunately I had to return them because I ordered a larger size (as suggested by some of the reviewers). I'm a 6.5, I ordered a 7. Big mistake! I even added an insert and they were still too large. These shoes run true to size. They are very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Baprincess

customer_reviews.title: Good for cross training.
customer_reviews.text: It took a little bit of time for me to get used to the high top around my ankle. I didn’t give the sneaker a five star because the laces do not go up far enough. They stop at the low part before the Velcro. Doesn’t make Sense to me. Otherwise, I used this sneaker for step aerobics and cross training.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Love These High Tops!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I love these high tops! They hit all the benchmarks for a perfect high top trainer! Plus they are so cute! Love the colorful options! I loved the support and comfort so much the day I tried them on I immediately ordered a second pair when I found a coupon taking over $20. Off! Great shoe at good price.
customer_reviews.author: ICUfree2

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lots of cushioning with each step. Fits nice. They do stretch out a lot after they are worn a while. I am on my feet a lot each day. I keep having to retie the shoes because the tongue keeps moving off the top of my foot. Which hurts the top of my foot and is annoying. Not as amazing as I expected for such a good brand name, but the cushioning exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba class!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Zumba class! Lots of support and cushion and the bottoms slide across the floor nicely for dance and Zumba workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Stoykovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these to workout in, hoping they would offer good support for my hiit workouts. They do do that, but the cushioning in the sole isn't as good as some shoes I've had. It's ok, just not as cushy as other workout shoes I've had. Something to be aware of it you are purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: karen k

customer_reviews.title: Crap material funky shoe
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on cheap material are correct. When I try these on they feel funky can't really explain it any other way they just don't feel right the foot bed feels weird they're just a weird feeling shoe these are going back
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: These really provided the ankle support that I needed. The outer mesh part started to crack within the first week. I guess it's lucky I am more interested in function than appearance.
customer_reviews.author: MamaShani

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My left shoe never came with an insole!!! I just had my ankle fused in January and have been having a lot of problems walking. I tried all kinds of shoes, then I bought these. These shoes have truly changed everything!! They are comfortable, they help me walk better, they are super cute, and they give excellent ankle support!! How
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for zumba
customer_reviews.text: I have had rykas in the past and been satisfied but these aren't the best. The shoe flexes in the center instead of at the pivot point. So there's not a lot of support in the arch. They're ok to work out in but will break down quickly and won't give long term support.
customer_reviews.author: MrsDubya

customer_reviews.title: Great support & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the additional support these sneakers provide. I wear these for Jazzercise exercise class and they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

customer_reviews.title: Ryka doesn’t disappoint ever- you need ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about Ryka but especially the sole, the looks design, and the construction of ankle support. The inner sole is featherweight and the heel has a genius cushion pad- I lace them on and get going and look down at the pretty color combo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Aerobic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable fit and support. I have used them for several years and always appreciated their quality. Appears to run about 1/2 size small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort & Support but poorly finished
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sneaker - fit, support, style - but what's extremely disappointing is that I've had them less than a year and all the seams are ripping and coming apart. I only use them for walking every day. They should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern pattern that is catchy but not flashy. Advertised as new, however arrived loose without a box, and with gravel, sand, and dirt ground into the tread. Exterior looked OK so disinfected them and tried them on. Fit was good.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Fit according to size and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes specifically for power walking. Even though I saw most of the recommendations for dance exercises, most said the shoe had great ankle support, and I needed that. I've enjoyed the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: G P

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with my feet no matter what shoe I wore until I found these. The are comfortable, fit perfect, and look good. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia B.

customer_reviews.title: The comfort is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel great. They support beautifully throughout and are very light weight. I was surprised how a shoe with great support and cushion could still support from the ground or floor. I cannot feel the ground or floor with these shoes on. I have bout Ryka for decades and tried others. These are by far The BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for some needs
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied and pleased with the overall fit, the ankle support and comfort level; not purchased for heavy workouts. Color combinations in this style are fun to wear and price was reasonable. Have been able so far to wear these all day into the evening with no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Rorie

customer_reviews.title: My new best workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a shoe like this for quite some time. It fits great and it is very comfortable . This is the first shoe in a long time that when I put it on my toes are not cramped and when I was training with my trainer on leg day they were so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: T.T

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cardio Dance
customer_reviews.text: I love this show for high impact cardio dance! The ankle support is solid and the heel cushioning in effective. I’ve had this shoe for 4 months and they are starting to fray at the top inside of the shoe. That’s unfortunate, since I only wear them 3 days/week to class. They only touch the gym floor never used as a street shoe. They fit great and will buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Zoom Zumba!
customer_reviews.text: It puts spring in my step while offering ankle support. I get many compliments on all of my Ryka sneakers. But the best compliment of all was when my Zumba teacher bought the same pair (different color).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have bad or hurt feet or ankle injuries. This is the shoe for you. Not only is this shoe great for Cross training workouts but it good for everyday use. My doesn't hurt and my feet and ankle are happy. Great investment. I have them in three different colors now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, too big, terrible design. I'm so unhappy with these shoes, I'll be donating them to some unlucky person.
customer_reviews.author: Shewolff

customer_reviews.title: Good for Ankle Support
customer_reviews.text: These work well for the ankle support I need due to an injury, however, the material on the outside of the shoe is thin and already has a chunk off of the one shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wish I Were in NYC

customer_reviews.title: 4 months of easy wear and already fraying
customer_reviews.text: Really love the comfort but sadly they are falling apart .. got them in sept didn’t wear them til April.. wore them on and off at work ( not Much walking maybe a mile a day ) for the last couple months and the one shoe is already worn and fraying :( I’m not hard on shoes.. most of my shoes last 5-10 yrs easy. Really disappointed cuz to me 80ish dollars is a lot to spend on something that doesn’t last 4 months
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been perfect for Zumba. They feel great, they have enough cushion and support. I love that they are wide width. I wear a 7 in dress shoes but learned it’s best to size up for workout shoes to give your room to move. So I got the 7.5 W and it’s perfect. The insert is removable but I loved that it was formed to have arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Picone

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted some comfortable shoes. She risked these sight unseen, yet they fit very well and she loves them. Purchase information and guidance was right on.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these shoes. I wear a size 11 in womens , in which I ordered. These shoes run very small. Having to return
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: First time with mid top shoes for training. Absolutely love these. I do CrossFit with cycling workouts and these provide stability with an excellent grip on the bottom. Will buy them again when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Soles falling apart in less than a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have barely worked out in these shoes for a month. I alternate them with another pair and on both shoes, the soles are coming apart! I do step aerobics and plyometric exercises in them. They have never been worn outdoors. I have worn Rykas for my workouts for years and this is the first pair that has done this. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping 4 Deals

customer_reviews.title: Sporty Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking shoe, but unfortunately it did not fit right for me. I had to return them. If they had fit, I would have been very pleased. I picked the widest, but still too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Groverman

customer_reviews.title: Great mid high aerobics shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe..style and fit really nice but..needs a more secure fit at the ankle. They dont tie that far up and the velcro does not extend far enough for a tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: Berna

customer_reviews.title: Get over the weird color combo they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today and wore them all day no breaking into do. A good solid supportive lightweight workout shoes very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Candace Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great dance -fitness exercise sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits and feels great 👍! Added bonus, looks good too! Also, good ankle support for lateral movement during dance fitness classes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much I bought a 2nd pair. Cushion inside really helps with older knees so much that all pain is almost gone. They fit perfectly and it's nice to find a handsome shoe in a wide size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are probably the best designed and high quality shoes I’ve ever had! I’m quickly wearing them out though, because I wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9 wide shoe and it fit my feet perfectly. I am using them for Zumba, but I found that they are quite good for indoor pickleball. Highly recommend for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Trekkergirl

customer_reviews.title: Ryka has the support and the cushioning for special needs feet.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is perfect for problem feet with bunions and no arches. They have improved my workouts and walking. I have been an ASICS devotee, but Ryka has stolen my heart (feet).
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I need lateral support while working out, and these shoes do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: jodi s Vinch

customer_reviews.title: This shoe not what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of Rykas fitness shoes for years. The newest purchase Devotion womens cross trainer is not as supportive as I had hoped. The tongue of the shoe slips down . Feels a half a size too big . I’m an 8.5 and feels like a 9.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked nice but I was disappointed that the size was not true. I’m size 7. Should have bought 7 1/2. 7 was too tight. The good part was that it was easy to return. No additional fees.
customer_reviews.author: Nitza Hartung

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sneakers for my arthritis in my feet, toes, and ankles. They have great support too!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and good length.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and have enough proper length... could use a little better arch support .
customer_reviews.author: Camille E.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap dime store quality construction and materials, non existent bounce and cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: White⛅️Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They run very small I never got a chance to figure out if I liked them or not
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: High quality, super comfortable, nice colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, super comfortable, cushiony with great support, high quality construction. Purchased them for jump roping and beach sports. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have bunion, plantar faciitis and Posterior tibial tendon dysfunction. i need shoes with good support. These shoes are very comfy and reduces my pain
customer_reviews.author: Asim1

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my ankles warm!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shoes cover most of my ankles. I use them for my daily exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: maryann hallisey

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like these shoes as I needed something that gave me more support in the ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: aed

customer_reviews.title: Even nicer on
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I work in the Amazon warehouse, and I’m on my feet all day. I’ve worn them almost two weeks. At the end of a long shift my feet feel good. These fit great, look amazing, and match all my clothes. I’m honestly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina Imani

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Great product my daughter won't wear any other brand this is her 4th pair an she athletic
customer_reviews.author: SPORTmen

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes to do Zumba and I have a bad ankle. The high Velcro strap above the ankle really supported my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Jann Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit, my feet are wide. I have become a new fan of Ryka!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer stephens

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied, in market for new pair that last as expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, fitting but after purchasing as a Zumba instructor ( with shoes only touching an actual dance floor 2 times /have worn on soft padded floor) the fabric on top seems to have ripped. I was very disappointed, paid a lot for these shoes.... but what are you to do?
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Ryka Aerobic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always a good shoe for the money. Good fit and quality. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the shoes less than a month and the mesh on the outside near the big toe area is already getting holes. I am a nurse and I only wear them to work so it is not because of abuse on the shoe. I did give 2 stars because they are pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Peppers

customer_reviews.title: Cute but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Returning these. The design is cute and they’re super light, but ultimately they were uncomfortable to dance in. The pivot point doesn’t work, the tread is kinda heavy, and the ankle piece doesn’t actually provide any support. I got them in size 7, my usual size, and they were too roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is really comfortable for standing and walking all day. I have a wide foot so i got it in a 10W but i probably could have gotten them in the standard width since i went a half size up i'm a 9.5. They dont flop or anything, but my toes have plenty of extra space. But overall a great and comfortable tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Zumba. Feet level like heaven now after workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Nursynurse88

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I've ever owned. Great for workouts and walking long distances. Excellent ankle support. Plenty of room for orthotics. Will be buying a 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for ankle and balance support
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of shoe. Needed for ankle and balance support. Fit is perfect and I ended up purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Too wide, I ordered the same size as the Ryka Tenacity (which I absolutely love) but this model is bigger. These were not ideal for me in zumba. The sneaker is beautiful, so I was sad to return these. I will keep ordering the Ryka Tenacity.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and give great support. I do Bang! and turning is very easy. I abuse my feet with exercise and they have relieved the stress to my feet. I love Ryka!!! They get it. I wear a 7.5 and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toe area and fits on the heel!
customer_reviews.text: Great roomy in the toe area and fits my narrow heel. My second pair of ryka and I’m happy with the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: I also like the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love that they’re built by women and are sized to fit a woman’s foot.
customer_reviews.author: travelingtweety

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I forgot about them!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore Rykas several years ago - then stopped working out - and totally forgot about them. So very glad to have them back in my foot's life! Arrived on time - love my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for jumping rope. It has a lot of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: PM3805

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for Zumba
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! It showed up quickly and I ordered my regular shoe size(9.5). Great in Zumba, and the high tops support my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: seagoing

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: At first they were tight in the toes as I wore them they felt alot better great shoe easy to put on and off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ryka shoes not good brand
customer_reviews.text: The shoes was cheaply made. The material was torn in less than 30-days. My daughter ended up with a huge whole in the top of her shoes. Never will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Morine D.

customer_reviews.title: Love these but would size up 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Ryka high tops but they did run a tiny bit small. I would order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Gym Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Requires no break-in time. Awesome design. Hot pink really pops. Hands down the best gym shoes I’ve owned to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RYKA Womens F4334M5 Devotion Xt Mid
product_meta.description: A mid-height upper on our devotion XT construction, the devotion XT mid features heel and midfoot lock down webbing systems. Internal achilles comfort cushion and ankle strap provide comfort and stability.
feature_bullets: Gradient fade on breathable mesh with heel and midfoot webbing lock down systems
